comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: William Hale Thompson (May 14, 1869 – March 19, 1944) was Mayor of Chicago from 1915 to 1923 and again from 1927 to 1931. Known as "Big Bill", Thompson was the last Republican to serve as Mayor of Chicago, and ranks among the most unethical mayors in American history. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Hale_Thompson

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks for providing his full name Richard Arthur Norton. We'll update our records.
